artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Yorozuya Magobei; Carver: Asai Ginjirō

description: portrait of a figure with a plant fiber mat wrapped around body, wearing a green patterned kimono with a white cloth with blue dots tied around head; moon in LRQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From A Barometer of Emotions (Seiu kandankei 情得感檀形)
signed: 応需よしとし筆 {ōju Yoshitoshi hitsu}
title: Evening Dew: Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō IX as Saitō Kuranosuke Toshimitsu
